description:
Vistaar explores global business dynamics, international trade, and cross-cultural
                                management. The club organizes global case studies, international business simulations,
                                and interactions with global business leaders.

Members participate in activities including international trade simulations, cross-cultural
                                communication workshops, global market analysis, and discussions on international business
                                strategies. The club also facilitates interactions with international students and professionals.

Through Vistaar, students develop a global perspective, understand international business
                                practices, and gain insights into managing businesses across different cultures and markets,
                                preparing them for careers in multinational corporations and global business.
